artist: Decorator: Albert Dammouse; Designer: Ernest Chaplet; Manufacturer: Haviland Co.
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Naomi Maurer and the publication of her book, 'The Pursuit of Spiritual Wisdom: The Thought and Art of Vincent Van Gogh and Paul Gauguin'
markings: 'H&Co' and '28', stamped, on bottom; 'A.B 3.1' (? partially illegible), incised on bottom; 'A.D' incised, under handle
medium: incised earthenware (grès brun) with enamel decoration
title: Pitcher
